Only AF in SG with a pool - Hotel pool in fact. With towels too. Work out here for a hotel gym-swim-chill session. Shower üöø is one of the best among AF. Rack is old though. Not too many machines and only one or two rack for free weight. Suffice though. Quiet too that's the bonus for people who wants tranquility. Expat crowd.

author: Alexander Aaltonen
text: I was around the area and needed a place for a workout, so decided to try this AF outlet. Overall a decent gym, super clean and we'll maintained equipment. But in terms of size, it's definitely quite small and not too much variety in equipment. Good enough for the essentials! A big plus with this outlet is that you also get access to the pool and you can also catch the shuttle bus that operates here.

author: Jeremy Lim
text: Gym itself is small but functional. Main issue is only one squat rack but it that said, it also has a platform. Dumbbells up to 30kg. The definite big feature is the fact that they give you access to the lap pool. 6am-10pm. Just have to come and tap. Awesome.

author: Emy Yue
text:
‚ÄúAnytime Fitness Balmoral‚Äù has quickly become one of my favorite places to work out. The environment is welcoming, clean, and motivating‚Äîperfect for anyone at any fitness level. The gym is well-equipped, and I love that it‚Äôs spacious enough to never feel overcrowded.

One of the highlights for me is the swimming pool, which is always well-maintained and a refreshing way to mix up my workouts. On top of that, the pickleball court is such a fun addition‚Äîit‚Äôs a great way to stay active while enjoying a more social and energetic atmosphere.

What makes the experience even better is the professionalism and support from the trainers, especially Trainer Riffic. He is knowledgeable, encouraging, and knows how to create a workout plan that suits my goals. His energy and guidance make every session productive and enjoyable.

Overall, Anytime Fitness Balmoral offers not just a gym, but a complete lifestyle environment‚Äîwith excellent facilities, a positive vibe, and trainers like Raffiq who truly care.

author: Talia Wong
text: Clean, sufficient equipment, friendly staff (thanks Seri!). Dumbbell up to 30kg. Doesn‚Äôt feel like a gym with the pool and courts access. All gyms should be equipped like this, tie up w hotel üòÇ ‚Ä¶

author: Justin Hoyo
text:
Cozy gym located at Mercury Hotel Stevens. Equipment were new and well-maintained, but I would consider this more of an ‚Äúhotel‚Äù gym as it was very small, the weights were quite limited, and there were very few machines as well. Hotel guests (non-af members) could also access and use the gym - which I find quite strange.

One plus point is that af members can use the swimming pool! There is also a pickleball court, but it‚Äôs extremely expensive at $45 per hour during peak hours (af members can get $5 off).

author: Jesslyn Ho
text: The atmosphere is very welcoming and the staff is very friendly! He showed me the amenities in the gym and there's a swimming pool which members can have access to! The gym is not big but well equipped. Will visit again next time! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

author: chen ying
text:
The facilities are absolutely wonderful, everything is well-maintained and clean. The gym itself looks fantastic and has quickly become one of my favorite places to work out!

Staff is super friendly and always ready to help. A special shout out to Seri, who‚Äôs been incredibly helpful!

author: Giovanni el gato
text:
It‚Äôs a gym , honestly filled with really great people , Rafiq was very approachable and he greets the guest when they enters and always ask how we are doing
syah is a great trainer too , even tough he‚Äôs not my trainer , there was once i wasn‚Äôt so sure about an exercise but he was really nice and taught me how to do it properly.
Seri was also really nice when i first entered she gave me a full run down o. how it works around the gym works and what facilities there are and what we can do here , really clear on the instructions on how the membership works too
overall , here has whatever you need to work on , there is a room where it‚Äôs empty but with weights and super great for abs and cardio really love the vibes and people and will always come back :))

author: Tabasco Guzzler
text: I used to be a member of the old Pinetree Club - so it was nostalgic to step into the building after many years of not being there. The place has changed completely - but the AF workout areas are super clean, with loos that are spic & span, as it's a fairly new gym. Very friendly staff who are proactive and provide great tips if you need help. AF members get free access to the decent lap pool & discounts on pickleball court bookings. Possibly the only AF gym that provides access to a pool!

author: Freddie Teow
text:
Came by this gym to have a look as it was near my office. Was surprised by the amenities it offered!
Cool that pool access was open to members and definitely loving the vibe from their staff Seri, who so warm heartedly welcomed me not like the other AFs I‚Äôve been to. Will definitely come by for my quick fix of work out :) ‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Shaun H
text: I had the privilege to work with Alan for >1 year. He's truly someone who's passionate about leading a healthy lifestyle. Essentially, he's dedicated, professional and easy going. He has motivated me to return to the gym and lead a healthy lifestyle.  His gentle yet concise pointers have refined my technique and I've already seen significant gains in the last 1 year. He backs all his nutritional & workout advice from academic journals & with his advice I'm in better shape in my 30s than I was in my 20s. Thanks for helping me achieve my physical and mental goals and being able to be the feel like a new person. Till our next fitness challenge. -Dr Shaun Ho

author: Lim Shiqing
text:
Started going to this gym a few months ago and I‚Äôm loving it! The environment is great ‚Äî clean, well-maintained space with new machines and helpful, friendly staff.

A big shoutout to my personal trainer, Alan. He‚Äôs super patient and really understands what women need from a fitness program. I‚Äôve always hated squats, and while most trainers say there‚Äôs no way around them, Alan introduced effective alternatives that still get results. He tailors every session so I feel challenged, but never overwhelmed.

Highly recommend Alan, especially for female clients looking for a supportive and thoughtful trainer!

author: jt wong
text:
I‚Äôve been a member of this gym since April, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with my experience! Although the space isn‚Äôt massive, it‚Äôs well-equipped with everything you need for a solid workout. The gym is always clean and well-maintained,  organized, creating a comfortable environment.

What truly sets this place apart is the friendly and helpful staff ‚Äî , a shout out to Seri ( extremely nice lady) , they‚Äôre always welcoming and ready to assist. This is also the only AF gym I know of that comes with an attached swimming pool with shower facilities, which is such a big plus. On top of that, they even have a pickleball court, which adds a fun and unique touch to the overall experience.

Highly recommend this gym to anyone looking for a complete, convenient, and enjoyable fitness experience!

author: Keith Ong
text: Small but they utilised the space well. Had 2 plate loaded machines whereas some bigger gyms are not even equipped with. Sufficient pin loaded machines with one that i have never see before - Multi Adjustable Press. Clean and nice toilets on top of everything.

author: Isa Aziz
text: The gym has a modern design with plenty of natural light and feels motivating from the moment you walk in. Highly recommended :)

author: Syoujin
text: Very clean and well maintained facilities and love that it has access to a picklebal court and a pool.

author: Daniel Huang
text: Very good facilities: pool is perfect. Pickleball court is excellent! Gym is impeccable.

author: Yiming Li
text: I wanted to be transferred out of this gym and i stopped going there. But i was manually signed in on the 26th of October. I strongly suspect this is the gym's doing to not lose members as the sign in resetted the time to transfer out. Thats rather scummy i aint gonna lie. In my humble opinion, i feel like the loss of their members is due to their imcompetence.

author: James Ng
text:
I enjoy the cozy private gym and the ease of how it‚Äôs near the bus stop.
Also, I thoroughly appreciate the collab with the hotel as this gym has access to towels and a swimming pool!
Lastly, the staff have been very friendly and willing to share their understanding of nutrition and exercise when I queries. Really a different experience altogether!

author: nil
text: this gym is so good till i have no words to describe my experience here , the staff here are unbelievable. Especially Jamie and Suri, being so helpful and accommodating with my needs. I highly recommend this gym to everyone

author: Li Ru Lim
text:
If you‚Äôre looking for a personal trainer who not only knows their stuff but truly cares, look no further. Allan is the kind of person who makes every session feel less like a workout and more like a boost of joy and motivation.

From day one, he went the extra mile‚Äîalways checking in, adjusting the program based on how I felt, and celebrating even the smallest wins with genuine excitement. What really sets Allan apart is his infectious energy. Like a ray of sunshine, he brightens up even the toughest mornings, and somehow makes pushing limits actually fun.

Training with Allan isn‚Äôt just about fitness‚Äîit‚Äôs about feeling supported, uplifted, and inspired. I honestly couldn‚Äôt ask for a better coach or companion on this journey.

author: Jess Tham
text:
I've had the pleasure of training with Alan Tham at Anytime Fitness Balmoral, and I can't recommend him highly enough. Alan is a rare blend of professionalism, expertise, and genuine encouragement. From day one, he took the time to understand my goals and tailored each session to challenge and motivate me without overwhelming.
His attention to form, technique, and progress is unmatched, and he consistently finds ways to keep workouts fresh and engaging. What truly sets Alan apart is his ability to create a supportive environment‚Äîhe‚Äôs not just a trainer, he‚Äôs a cheerleader, coach, and mentor all rolled into one.
Thanks to Alan, I‚Äôve seen real results and gained confidence both inside and outside the gym. If you're looking for someone who truly cares and brings out the best in you, Alan‚Äôs your guy!

author: Robert Jones
text: Had a great time at this gym. Pristine equipment, friendly staff, comfortable atmosphere, what more can you ask for? Do visit this gym!

author: Abigail Grace
text: Brand new gym that just opened this year! Friendly trainers and thank you Sha for being so helpful with my evolt scan, super clean gym and well ventilated with pool and pickleball court outside!

author: Jennifer Tham
text: Trainer Alan has been very patient and professional in his training. Going to the gym had never been such a pleasant experience for me. Really thank him so much. Gym facilities are in great condition and clean as well. Kudos to the team at Anytime Fitness Balmoral!

author: Civ Enriquez
text: Nice place with access to pool. Though gym place is smaller than expected

author: Muhammad Amir Rawi
text:
I‚Äôve known PT Allan Tham from his time at AF Jurong East and he has presented himself in a very welcoming and jovial manner. And despite his carefree personality, he has shown a processional attitude towards his past clients in the gym. Being encouraging and working within the means of his clients, adjusting to their needs.

I would highly recommend him if you are starting out and would like up learn from him and his discipline.

You will not be discouraged from committing to your personal journey in health and fitness. He brings with him a very welcoming training environment.

author: C Y
text: Very nice gym with good ambience and facilities. There is also pickleball facility which members can book with a discount and free swimming pool usage. A very unique gym.

author: Farhana Zakariah
text: I had a wonderful experience at the Balmoral outlet thanks to Seri. She took the time to walk me through the gym facilities and also gave me a clear introduction to the swimming amenities. Seri was warm, professional, and very attentive, making the whole tour smooth and welcoming. Her friendly guidance really left a great impression and made me feel comfortable about starting here. Excellent service!

author: hita gulati
text: Anytime fitness Balmoral is great gym with the best facilities and equipments members have access to the pool and the pickle ball court . The staff is extremely helpful and cooperative will go the extra mile to help you when you need it . I would say a complete package for all you fitness goals.

author: Fiona Loh
text: The gym is a little small with limited dumbbell weights otherwise well equipped. There's a small posing/stretching room which is nice. Trainer Alan there spotted me when he saw me lifting heavier weights and cheered me on, friendly guy.

author: taco limited
text: Brand new gym so it‚Äôs nice and clean! Not a big gym but it does the job for me. Friendly staff and I enjoy the weekly classes as well.

author: Jeremiah Sullivan
text: Fantastic Gym, Great vibes, everything a gym needs. Staff are extremely nice. Lighting is very lively. 10/10 would recommend.

author: galistan
text: One of the friendliest and better gym I‚Äôve been too.  The staff there are super approachable! You get to use the pool! Best recovery cardio!

author: Clarence Chua
text: Staff were very friendly and welcoming. Gym was clean and well maintained. Enjoyed coming to this gym!

author: Billy Joel Ponce
text: The ammenities is superb. Equipment is state of the art. Although the gym is small. This branch got alot to offer. Got free access to swimming pool is super plus. Will surely go back here.

author: Bariq Nurlis
text: Great swimming pool and the gym is lovely, they got showers with soap and shampoo

author: Pavithiren Prestian
text: felt that they played the racist card as i‚Äôm an indian , because my friends were chinese & the female staff who looks in her 30 to 40 years old only entertained my chinese friends by showing them around in the gym & guiding them . but not me when i reached 40mins earlier than them

author: Seri Dewi
text: Very nice environment can access the hotel swimming pool toilet is unisex both ladies and gentlemen can access ..towel provided, equipment the best! Very friendly and helpful staff.

author: SJ Y
text: Clean gym and convenient location for me! Recently started to join the new group classes and the staff are lovely too üòÜüí™ ‚Ä¶

author: Catherine Tan
text: Allan is super encouraging and knowledgeable. Love training at Anytime Fitness Balmoral ‚Äî great vibes, clean space, and real progress!

author: mi ye jin
text: Alan is a superb personal trainer, the gym is clean and staffs are very friendly. Very lovely gym.

author: Motivational Story of the year
text: Very unique and superb set up. All AF members should come here and try. I think i will visit this gym more often

author: Justin
text: Excellent gym with well-maintained facilities and very friendly staff!!

author: Liau Li Jun
text: Very spacious and all the equipment are well spaced out. It also comes with a swimming pool :) trainers are also very friendly here!

author: Jonah Kwek
text: Clean, well-maintained equipment, and the staff are very friendly and professional! Also amazing that you get access to the swimming pool üòÑ ‚Ä¶

author: Kent Lee
text: Spacious, very clean and the most advanced bathrooms! (Motion sensor trash can)

author: Eugene Yeo
text: Clean and well marine‚Äôs gym . Good anytime fitness staff as well

author: Joseph Chow
text: It‚Äôs awesome. Seri and the rest of the team are the best. So friendly and helpful.

author: Chili Red Arowana
text: Rude malay boy staff, that day i was asking a Question to the aunty staff, this tall malay boy interrupted in a rude manner to cut me off. He should be fired, how can interrupt customers?

author: Atticus Finch
text: Decently sized gym with new equipments. Good air conditioning too!

author: tatana bella
text: super fun staff, heard there is new equipment comingggüòçüòç ‚Ä¶

author: Michelle Tan
text: Very friendly and helpful staff; very clean environment with good views. Highly recommended!

author: Martyn O'Brien
text: Friendly, top class gym. Let‚Äôs train!

text: The club is so nice and organized plus coach Seri is so accommodating

text: The man at the desk is very kind and super handsome, I mistakenly called him Brad Pitt, someone sign him up to Hollywood!

text: The pool is very refreshing! Country club vibe :)

text: Nice experience, very kind and cordial staff.

author: Ciara
text: my favourite AF and Seri is so sweet!üòÅüòÅ ‚Ä¶

text: Gym is in the hotel so members can use the pool too!

text: Awesome  facilities!! Staff seri very Friendly

text: Forget your anger , forget your anxiety , staffs here are helpful with your workouts , you will find your paradise here ! üòé .... ‚Ä¶

text: Love the placeü•¥ü•¥ so many hot guys ‚Ä¶

text: amazing gym amazing bathroom amazing pool everything amazing

text: A good condition and environment to work out !

text: The place is very nice!

text: Have a nice swimming experience

text: Now change some  news no bad

text: Good gym wow

text: Nice facilities.

author: S Divyan Pillai

author: David
text: Came from London on holiday and only in the area and few nights... came here forgot my water bottle and my tshirt.. staff gave me a tshirt to borrow and a watebottle to keep! Amazing and friendly would recommend

author: Asty
text: I‚Äôve been coming to this gym for months now and honestly, it‚Äôs become my second home. The equipment is always clean, well-maintained, and there‚Äôs never a moment where I feel like I‚Äôm waiting forever for a machine. The staff are super chill and friendly ‚Äî not overbearing, just genuinely helpful. Don't even get me started on the vibes here. It is really easy to stay consistent; everyone‚Äôs focused and it just pushes you to do better. If you‚Äôre trying to level up your fitness, this place makes it easy to show up and put in the work.

author: Parker Reilly
text: Fantastic gym

author: killian
text: Hi Mr Smith  thank you for the 20 stars :) Hope you have a great work out!
